languages.text: {n}Ваше внимание привлекает Караэль. В его взгляде, устремленном на Назракея, нет ни капли подобострастия или почтительности — одна мрачная веселость.{/n} "Я бы поспорил с этим утверждением. Впрочем, слишком много болтовни. Приказы, архонт?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ваше внимание привлекает Караэль — друкари-переговорщик, прибывший когда-то к вам на корабль и ныне стоящий среди своих соплеменников. В его взгляде, устремленном на Назракея, нет ни капли подобострастия или почтительности — одна мрачная веселость, обещающая неизбывные страдания. Кажется, разговор Назракея и Маражая... развлекает его?{/n}
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}You find your attention drawn to Kharael. When he looks at Nazrakhei, there is no reverence or subservience in his gaze, only grim amusement.{/n} "I would argue with that statement, but we are talking too much as it is. What are your orders, Archon?"
languages.original_text: {n}Ваше внимание привлекает Караэль. В его взгляде, устремленном на Назракея, нет ни капли подобострастия или почтительности — одна мрачная веселость.{/n} "Я бы поспорил с этим утверждением. Впрочем, слишком много болтовни. Приказы, архонт?"

traits.locale_text: {n}You find your attention drawn to Kharael. When he looks at Nazrakhei, there is no reverence or subservience in his gaze, only grim amusement.{/n} "I would argue with that statement, but we are talking too much as it is. What are your orders, Archon?"
traits.speaker: Karael

traits.locale_text: {n}You find your attention drawn to Kharael. When he looks at Nazrakhei, there is no reverence or subservience in his gaze, only grim amusement.{/n} "I would argue with that statement, but we are talking too much as it is. What are your orders, Archon?"
traits.speaker: Karael

traits.locale_text: {n}You find your attention drawn to Kharael. When he looks at Nazrakhei, there is no reverence or subservience in his gaze, only grim amusement.{/n} "I would argue with that statement, but we are talking too much as it is. What are your orders, Archon?"
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}Deine Aufmerksamkeit richtet sich wie von selbst auf Kharael. Als er Nazrakhei anblickt, liegt in seinem Blick keine Ehrerbietung oder Unterwürfigkeit, nur düstere Belustigung.{/n} "Ich würde ja widersprechen, aber wir verlieren ohnehin schon zu viele Worte. Wie lauten Eure Befehle, Archon?"
languages.original_text: {n}You find your attention drawn to Kharael. When he looks at Nazrakhei, there is no reverence or subservience in his gaze, only grim amusement.{/n} "I would argue with that statement, but we are talking too much as it is. What are your orders, Archon?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Aufmerksamkeit richtet sich wie von selbst auf Kharael. Als er Nazrakhei anblickt, liegt in seinem Blick keine Ehrerbietung oder Unterwürfigkeit, nur düstere Belustigung.{/n} "Ich würde ja widersprechen, aber wir verlieren ohnehin schon zu viele Worte. Wie lauten Eure Befehle, Archon?"
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}你注意到了卡瑞尔。当他看着纳扎骸时，他的目光中没有一丝尊敬或顺从，只有冷酷的消遣。{/n}“我同意这种说法，但我们聊得太久了。执政官，您有什么吩咐？”
languages.original_text: {n}You find your attention drawn to Kharael. When he looks at Nazrakhei, there is no reverence or subservience in his gaze, only grim amusement.{/n} "I would argue with that statement, but we are talking too much as it is. What are your orders, Archon?"

traits.locale_text: {n}你注意到了卡瑞尔。当他看着纳扎骸时，他的目光中没有一丝尊敬或顺从，只有冷酷的消遣。{/n}“我同意这种说法，但我们聊得太久了。执政官，您有什么吩咐？”
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}Vous portez votre attention sur Kharael. Quand il regarde Nazrakhei, c'est sans aucune révérence ou soumission, mais plutôt avec un sinistre amusement.{/n} « Je suis en désaccord avec cette affirmation, mais cette conversation n'a que trop duré. Quels sont vos ordres , archonte ? »
languages.original_text: {n}You find your attention drawn to Kharael. When he looks at Nazrakhei, there is no reverence or subservience in his gaze, only grim amusement.{/n} "I would argue with that statement, but we are talking too much as it is. What are your orders, Archon?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous portez votre attention sur Kharael. Quand il regarde Nazrakhei, c'est sans aucune révérence ou soumission, mais plutôt avec un sinistre amusement.{/n} « Je suis en désaccord avec cette affirmation, mais cette conversation n'a que trop duré. » Quels sont vos ordres , archonte ? »
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}Tu atención se centra en Kharael. Cuando mira a Nazrakhei, no hay ni reverencia ni sumisión en su mirada. Solo una diversión sombría.{/n} «Discutiría esa afirmación, pero ya hemos perdido mucho tiempo hablando. ¿Qué ordenas, Arconte?».
languages.original_text: {n}You find your attention drawn to Kharael. When he looks at Nazrakhei, there is no reverence or subservience in his gaze, only grim amusement.{/n} "I would argue with that statement, but we are talking too much as it is. What are your orders, Archon?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu atención se centra en Kharael. Cuando mira a Nazrakhei, no hay ni reverencia ni sumisión en su mirada. Solo una diversión sombría.{/n} «Discutiría esa afirmación, pero ya hemos perdido mucho tiempo hablando. ¿Qué ordenas, Arconte?».
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}あなたは自身がカラエルに注意を払っていることに気づく。彼がナズラクヘイを見る際、その視線には敬意や服従といったものはなく、気味の悪い悦楽だけが見える。{/n}「その発言には賛同できないが、我々は長く話しすぎた。アーコン、あなたの命令は何です？」
languages.original_text: {n}You find your attention drawn to Kharael. When he looks at Nazrakhei, there is no reverence or subservience in his gaze, only grim amusement.{/n} "I would argue with that statement, but we are talking too much as it is. What are your orders, Archon?"

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは自身がカラエルに注意を払っていることに気づく。彼がナズラクヘイを見る際、その視線には敬意や服従といったものはなく、気味の悪い悦楽だけが見える。{/n}「その発言には賛同できないが、我々は長く話しすぎた。アーコン、あなたの命令は何です？」
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}Kendini Kharael'i gözlemlerken buluyorsun. Nazrakhei'e bakan gözlerinde hürmet veya bağlılık değil, yalnızca gaddarca bir keyif görüyorsun.{/n} "Bu dediğine itiraz ederdim ama yeterince konuştuk. Emirlerin nedir Arkon?"
languages.original_text: {n}You find your attention drawn to Kharael. When he looks at Nazrakhei, there is no reverence or subservience in his gaze, only grim amusement.{/n} "I would argue with that statement, but we are talking too much as it is. What are your orders, Archon?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kendini Kharael'i gözlemlerken buluyorsun. Nazrakhei'e bakarken gözlerinde hürmet veya boyun eğme yok, yalnızca gaddarca bir zevk var.{/n} "Bu önermeye itiraz ederdim ama zaten çok fazla konuşuyoruz. Emirlerin nedir Arkon?"
traits.speaker: Karael
